translations: 幻影似的；变幻不定的；幻想的；幽灵的

sentences.sentence: Brief components thus created a phantasmagoric, new and exciting vitality.
sentences.translation: 简约的要素产生了一种变幻的、新的、令人激动的活力。

sentences.sentence: It was like nothing so much as the phantasmagoric play of the northern lights.
sentences.translation: 这和北极光的变幻不定极其相似。

sentences.sentence: The reflectivity of glass curtain walls will produce more visual phantasmagoric effects.
sentences.translation: 玻璃幕墙的反射性则会产生更多的视觉变幻。
